title: BRIEF-Bidvest Group Shareholders Approve Authorising Co To Provide Financial Assistance To Related Cos
text:
BRIEF-Bidvest Group Shareholders Approve Authorising Co To Provide Financial Assistance To Related Cos

Stock Markets 36 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 12:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bidvest Group Shareholders Approve Authorising Co To Provide Financial Assistance To Related Cos Oct 15 (Reuters) - Bidvest Group Ltd : * BIDVEST GROUP LTD - SHAREHOLDERS APPROVED SPECIAL RESOLUTION AUTHORISING CO TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO RELATED OR INTER-RELATED COS * BIDVEST GROUP - CONFIRMED THAT, IT IS SATISFIED THAT AFTER PROVIDING SUCH FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, COM WOULD SATISFY SOLVENCY AND LIQUIDITY TEST

BRIEF-Bidvest Group Shareholders Approve Authorising Co To Provide Financial Assistance To Related Cos
description: BRIEF-Bidvest Group Shareholders Approve Authorising Co To Provide Financial Assistance To Related Cos
